EmailTemplate.description: Auto-response when new lead is submitted online (for generic use).
EmailTemplate.name: Leads: Web-to-Lead email response with Letterhead
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Organization.Name} Thank you for your submission
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Salutation} {!Lead.Name},
Thank you for providing your details. The submitted information has been forwarded to a u-blox sales representative for processing and confirmation.
The data submitted will be held in strict confidence.
Kind regards u-blox
